description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The classic Chinese 'takeaway' puzzle is a BIG HIT* on XBOX and now we've UPDATED it a second time.  18 tile sets, 100 challenging layouts and  a layout editor to create your own layouts.  Trial game is fun and totally playable but with some limited options.  *Mahjong Moves is purchased by more than half of the people who try it!
